glsa.title: Fail2ban: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: Fail2ban is vulnerable to a Denial of Service attack.

background.p: Fail2ban is a tool for parsing log files and banning IP addresses which make too many password failures.

description.p: A vulnerability has been discovered in Fail2ban when parsing log files.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send specially crafted SSH login banners to the vulnerable host, which would prevent any ssh connection to the host and result in a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Fail2ban users should upgrade to the latest version:
